pullrequest.title: Add simple collision model for Ranger

content.raw:
I've added steerable front wheels, steering wheel, hand brake, and gas/brake pedals, as well as some inertial parameters for the vehicle in branch [polaris_scpeters](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/compare/polaris_scpeters..polaris_simple_collisions#diff). We still need to model the hand rails and roll cage, but that is captured in issue #1.

Also, it doesn't have a plugin block. I've tested it in gazebo with the following block added, but this plugin is only available in drcsim. Should we add the DRCVehiclePlugin in a renamed form to gazebo or keep this as a model without a plugin for the time being?
~~~
    <plugin name='vehicle' filename='libDRCVehiclePlugin.so'>
      <front_left_wheel>front_left_wheel_joint</front_left_wheel>
      <front_right_wheel>front_right_wheel_joint</front_right_wheel>
      <front_left_wheel_steering>front_left_steering_joint</front_left_wheel_steering>
      <front_right_wheel_steering>front_right_steering_joint</front_right_wheel_steering>
      <back_left_wheel>rear_left_wheel_joint</back_left_wheel>
      <back_right_wheel>rear_right_wheel_joint</back_right_wheel>
      <gas_pedal>gas_joint</gas_pedal>
      <brake_pedal>brake_joint</brake_pedal>
      <steering_wheel>steering_joint</steering_wheel>
      <hand_brake>hand_brake_joint</hand_brake>
      <front_torque>0</front_torque>
      <back_torque>2000</back_torque>
      <front_brake_torque>2000</front_brake_torque>
      <back_brake_torque>2000</back_brake_torque>
      <tire_angle_range>0.5</tire_angle_range>
      <max_speed>10</max_speed>
      <aero_load>0.1</aero_load>
    </plugin>
~~~
